name: BloodHunter (CIVERPUNC)
description:
Description

Bloodhunter is a game where you'll have to survive infinite rounds of enemies while managing your resources carefully. 

In this apocalyptic world and with your own health as your only weapon, every shot is a decision, make one mistake and you'll be surrounded by vicious zombies. So, get blood, get stronger and resist.

Bloodhunter has:

  • Limited Resources
  • Infinite Rounds
  • Level-up system
  • Way too much red

Controls

W/A/S/D - Move

E - Donate Blood

Left Click - Shoot
